programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep25
programme.desc: Coronation of the Iron Goddess - When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep55
programme.desc: Iron Ted Weekend - King Julien and team discover a trapped Crimson and must team up to defeat a beast; Mort tries to rally his fellow lemurs but they are losing hope

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep324
programme.desc: Pups Save a Giant Plant / Pups Get Stuck - Buddy - Mayor Goodways gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when its planted in the wrong place. Time for a transplant! // Metal mayhem ensues when Marshalls Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.desc: Andy and the Storm Petrel - Andy goes on an aquatic adventure to the Galapagos Islands in search of a storm petrel.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Proper Pirate Proficiency Test - Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep19
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Scarecrow Challenge - It is harvest day on Captain Captain's vegetable patch and Sandy and Seaweed are helping dig up her carrots.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Tablet Takeover - The Veggies are delighted with a new tablet they've found. When they're not looking, Evil Pea turns the tablet to evil mode. Soon the tablet takes over the supermarket.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping, so they build a tent. Then the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Salmon Run, Alaska - Alaska's a cool place to watch the salmon run, but Glitch opens a 'fishy taxi service' to help the salmon avoid tricky waterfalls and greedy bears. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Over and Under - Kit and Pup are out and about. Can you see who is going over the bridge and who is going under the bridge? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators pass toys over and under to get from one side of the room to the other.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Bath - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bath' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different baths - a baby bath, a bubble bath, a bird bath and even a banana bath!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Bunny Rabbits - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch bunny rabbits. Bunny ears and tails appear on the Teletubbies. They do the 'bunny hop hop' before saying 'eh oh' to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hello, Hello (Eh-Oh!) - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and say "Hello".

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Block - A strange robot block lands on the Clangers Planet. It takes soil samples and produces a plan. It soon becomes clear it is looking for a place to build new tower blocks.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Sports Day - It's Pop Paper City Sports Day and Mae-Mae is the Sports Day judge, but can she decide on the right winner?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hiders N' Seekers - In this episode, a small addition brings big excitement to a game of Hide N' Seek!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Vivienne Blows Her Top - Messy and his friends have animals to save and eruptions to stop in OKIDO when Vivienne Volcano gets a rumbly tummy. Oh dear!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Fossil Puzzle - In the real world, Messy is bored of his dino-jigsaw. In OKIDO, his friends help him piece together a real prehistoric puzzle!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Happy Ordinary Day - Monty is in the mood for celebrating and begins to wonder if you really can only celebrate big, special occasions.

programme.desc: It's Time to Build a Nest - JoJo and Gran Gran spot a bird's nest in Cynthia's garden, which inspires JoJo to make a nest for Panda. Meanwhile, Daddy helps teach JoJo how to whistle just like a bird.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Time For Some Science - It's a rainy day. JoJo wants to go outside to splash in puddles, while Isaiah wants to be inside with his science books. Gran Gran's plan has a new word to learn - compromise!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep7

programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Thing That Wouldn't Leave - It's Spring Break and Nate joins Francis on vacation! There he discovers the Pope Family Schedule aka an opportunity to pencil in AWESOMENESS. But not everyone is on board, especially when Nate's alter ego, Nathaniel, emerges.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep268
programme.desc: A Place for Pets / Lockdown for Love - When customers bring pets into the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs soon realizes pets are more profitable than owners. // Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep269
programme.desc: Under the Small Top / Squidward's Sick Daze - Squidward's house becomes infested with a mail-order flea circus meant for SpongeBob. // Squidward fakes being sick to get out of work, but his agony only begins when SpongeBob arrives to care for him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: Ink Lemonade - Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Snow Way to Win / Causing Treble - It's a snow day! Sammy and Raj are ready to race their sleighs but when they get to the mount, Tara has already set up camp.// Sammy, Raj and Dadi are a musical sensation! But after entering a local talent on show, Raj becomes really nervous.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Invader Dim / Getting Heated - Tara's pranks have gone too far and it's time for pay-back! // There's a heatwave and Sammy and Raj are over it. Luckily Sammy remembers he has two VIP passes to The Polar Palace!

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Bear Necessities - Mother's Day goes wrong and the Maltos discover a toxic threat to Mother Earth.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Warzone - Robby and Mo join the Terrans on a visit to the Spacebridge Memorial Park, but the memory of the siege opens old wounds...and more...for Megatron.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Sells Out / Neptune's Ball - The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors. // The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep247
programme.desc: Swamp Mates / One Trick Sponge - Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Fluff Love - Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards - Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Backpay Payback / House Hunting - Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil. // The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Shack Magic - The Chipmunks find a shack that magically fills with toys and games, but is it magic or something more sinister?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep503
programme.desc: U-Fly / Yeti or Not - Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on afterhours. // On a ski trip, Alvin convinces Theodore there's a Yeti nearby, making life miserable for the rest of the family.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Taken / The Flying Beast - The boy's imaginations run wild when Dave disappears. When they finally find him, they're convinced he's a zombie. // Alvin tries to convince Dave that he's being hunted by a flying beast.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep323
programme.desc: The Fourfold Trap - The Turtles are baited by an unknown enemy into deadly traps.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Dinosaur Seen in Sewers! - When Raph makes a new friend in Zog, an alien Triceraton, he may have bitten off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Annihilation: Earth! Part 1 - When the Turtles get word of the Kraang's return, they realize there is an even bigger threat coming to Earth!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Tales of Ba Sing Se - A series of short stories, highlighting different characters and their individual adventures in the city. Tales of Katara and Toph, Uncle, Sokka, Aang, Zuko, and Momo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Appa's Lost Days - In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen, and find out exactly what happened to him, and where's he's been all this time - and where he is now!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Earth King - The kids battle Long Feng the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep219
programme.desc: The Guru - Aang starts to learn control of the Avatar State from Guru Pathik at the Eastern Air Temple. Sokka is reunited with his father.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep126
programme.desc: One Better Day - Part 1 / One Better Day - Part 2 - Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Cactus Sitting / Disaster of Hole 2 - The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester won't let Grumpy Pants' round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Get the Hump / Sing For Your Supper - It's Best to the rescue when Bester's phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Shape of Grumbles / Wai Po's Wild Day - Grumbles gets the hiccups, and they make him morph out of control. // Abby wants to make a splizzacular day for Wai Po, but Wai Po keeps getting into Fuzzly trouble.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Abby Loses Elvin / The Berry Thief - Abby tries to kitty-sit Elvin, but the kitten keeps running off and disappearing. // Abby has to stop chipmunks from stealing the veggies in the garden.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep113
programme.desc: Krusty Krushers / The Card - Mr. Krabs hatches up another get-rich-quick scheme: professional wrestling! But Mr. Krabs isn't the one who's going to wrestle. // The new Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy trading cards are on sale, and Bob is determined to get the rare talking card.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep114
programme.desc: Dear Vikings / Ditchin' - There's a new Viking-themed promotion at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob is determined to find out everything there is to know about Vikings. // Mermaidman and Barnacleboy are having a book signing, but SpongeBob can't go because he has boating school.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep115
programme.desc: Grandpappy the Pirate / Cephalopod Lodge - Mr. Krabs' granddad is coming to town! But instead of being excited, Mr. Krabs is nervous because his swarthy pirate granddad thinks that Mr. Krabs is a pirate, too. // Squidward is a member of a secret society, SpongeBob decides he wants to join.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep211
programme.desc: Plankton Retires - Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep116

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku (Rpt)
programme.desc: Kebawah Duli Yang Maha Mulia Seri Paduka Baginda Yang di-Pertuan Agong ke-XVI Al-Sultan Abdullah telah hampir lima tahun memegang tampuk kepimpinan negara sejak 31 Januari 2019. Duli-duli Yang Maha Mulia Tuanku Yang di-Pertuan Agong dan Raja Permaisuri Agong amat dikenali sebagai Raja berjiwa rakyat dan sentiasa mengambil berat tentang permasalahan rakyat selain menyantuni rakyat yang menjadi mangsa bencana, dalam apa jua keadaan sekalipun. Kini lima tahun kemudianrata-rata rakyat merafakkan sembah Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku.

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: 2332 Kembara Kenali Borneo (Rpt)
programme.desc: Dokumentari Khas ini memaparkan pengalaman Rombongan Diraja, Yang di-Pertuan Agong Al Sultan Abdullah Riayatuddin Al Mustafa Billah Shah dan Raja Permaisuri Agong Tengku Azizah Aminah Maimunah Iskandariah dalam perjalanan epik Kembara Kenali Borneo pada September 2023. Sejarah terpahat apabila Baginda berdua merupakan pimpinan tertinggi negara yang pertama berkenan mengadakan lawatan ke negeri yang terletak di kepulauan Borneo melalui lebuhraya Pan Borneo, merangkumi jarak perjalanan sejauh 2,332 kilometer. Bermula di Tawau, Sabah sehingga ke Kuching, Sarawak -- Kembara Kenali Borneo menjadi manifestasi keprihatian Rombongan Diraja terhadap kehidupan masyarakat, dan perkara ini juga dibuktikan melalui sambutan meriah rakyat yang pertama kali bertentang mata dengan Baginda berdua.

programme.desc: Soledad Vargas - Fighting against Femicide - Soledad Vargas, a boxing champion from Mexico, took a break from her sport after giving birth to her third child. Now, shes preparing for her comeback fight while juggling training sessions, breastfeeding, and family life. But Soledad is also fighting against femicide in Mexico. She writes the names of murdered women on her boxing garb. "I don't want to lose a single woman more, she says.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC278UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between welterweight champion Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and rival Leon Rocky Edwards. Plus, Luke Rockhold returned to action to face Paulo Costa. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Grappler vs Grappler - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep904NamajunasvsZhang2
programme.desc: New Yorks Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between Thug Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Vegas Golden Fights - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.

programme.desc: Main Event - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night Ankalaev vs Walker 2
programme.desc: Prelims - A controversial score will be settled at the APEX in Las Vegas on January 14, and this time, light heavyweight contenders Magomed Ankalaev and Johnny Walker will have five rounds to handle their business in a UFC Fight Night main event. A no contest in the pairs October bout left many unanswered questions and, this time, the Russian powerhouse and the dynamic Brazilian striker square off in a rematch, with both determined to dominate and make their case for a shot at the 205-pound title
